ProjectTitle: Gastric interoception: Towards an improved understanding of interoceptive processes within and across organ domains in healthy individuals and patients with functional dyspepsia.
InitialFeedbackHistory: 25/04/2024 [REDACTED] please clarify why you are indicating that redcap is HIPAA compliant, are you collaborating with researchers in the USA? [REDACTED] so please describe this in the data section under reuse of existing data and/or 3rd party agreements. [REDACTED] when sharing data on OSF please make sure it is fully anonymous without any risk to re-identify the subjects. [REDACTED] full anonymization is not possible, please use RDR where you can restrict access to the files with sensitive data, you can import your data from OSF using the integration dashboard: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/integration-dashboard
